jd: From: Rohan Thakur, Diasoftwaresolutions rohan@diasoftwaresolutions.com Reply to: rohan@diasoftwaresolutions.com Actively Looking for Job Title: Business Analyst - Data WarehouseLocation: Austin, TX (Hybrid)Experience: 10+ yearsDuration: 12 monthsPlease share resumes At Rohan@diasoftwaresolutions.comKey Responsibilities:Gather, analyze, and document business requirements for system modifications and enhancements to the Financial Data Warehouse.Collaborate with business and technical teams to ensure accurate and comprehensive requirement documentation, including user stories, business requirement documents, and technical specifications.Coordinate with technical teams to facilitate system demos and scrum meetings.Communicate project updates and manage user communication effectively.Work within an Agile development framework, contributing to sprints and scrums.Provide support for systems testing (Unit, Integration, and UAT) and ensure that solutions meet business requirements.Offer on-call support depending on the project phase.Required Skills & Experience:9+ years of experience as a Business Analyst.9+ years of SQL experience.8+ years of experience with system reporting (Oracle, SQL).8+ years of systems testing experience (Unit, Integration, UAT).8+ years of experience with Agile software development methodologies.Preferred Skills:2+ years of experience with data warehouse applications and/or database reporting features.2+ years of project and/or product management experience.Experience with Jira for project tracking and management.
